-0.10.5.jar controlRole:admin localhost:8080 org.archive.crawler:name=3DHer=
itrix,type=3DService

Heritrix listens for HTTP connections (the web user i=
nterface) on port
8080, not JMX. JMX is listening on port 8849. Try the fol=
lowing
instead:

java -jar cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.5.jar controlRole:admin l=
ocalhost:8849 org.archive.crawler:name=3DHeritrix,type=3DService

best,
Eri=
k Hetzner
